definitions.text: belongs to lowest social and ritual class in India
beyond the reach of criticism or attack or impeachment; - Newsweek
examples: for the first time criticism was directed at a hitherto untouchable target
in most museums such articles are untouchable

definitions.text: ( especially used in traditional Hindu belief of the lowest caste or castes) defiling

examples: a rare work, today almost inaccessible
timber is virtually unobtainable in the islands
untouchable resources buried deep within the earth
